login.title: Log into your Account
login.forgot_password_desc: Password reset is handled by the system administrator.
login.forgot_step_1: Contact the store owner or system administrator
login.forgot_step_2: They can reset your password from the Users management page
login.forgot_step_3: Log in with the new password provided
login.forgot_password_note: For security reasons, passwords can only be reset by an administrator with owner-level access.

help.title: Help & Contact
help.subtitle: Need assistance with your workstation? We are here to help you get the most out of your management system.

faq.title: Common Questions
faq.q1: How do I reset my shift stats?
faq.a1: Go to settings and select 'Reset Session' to start a fresh shift counter.
faq.q2: Can I use multiple cashiers simultaneously?
faq.a2: Yes, use the cashier selector in the top right to switch between profiles.
faq.a3: Margins are the difference between your selling price and the recorded base cost.

help.title: Help & Contact
help.subtitle: Need assistance with your workstation? We are here to help you get the most out of your management system.

faq.title: Common Questions
faq.q1: How do I add a new product to the inventory?
faq.a1: Go to the Inventory page, click the "Add Product" button, and fill in the product details including name, barcode, price, and stock quantity. You can also import products in bulk using a CSV file via the Import button.
faq.q2: How do I process a refund or return?
faq.a2: Navigate to Reports → Sales, find the transaction you want to refund, and click on it to view details. Use the refund option to process a partial or full return. The stock will be automatically updated.
faq.q3: How do I set up a new cashier account?
faq.a3: Go to Users page from the sidebar, click "Add User", enter the cashier's name and create a PIN code. The cashier can then log in using the Cashier Login option on the login screen.
faq.q4: How do I view daily sales reports?
faq.a4: Go to the Reports page to see detailed sales data. You can filter by date range, payment method, and cashier. The Dashboard also shows today's revenue, profit, and sales analytics at a glance.
faq.q5: How do I manage low stock alerts?
faq.a5: Each product has a "Reorder Level" field. When stock falls below this threshold, the product appears in the Low Stock section on the Inventory page. You can also export a low stock report as CSV.
faq.q6: How do I use the barcode scanner?
faq.a6: On the POS page, click the barcode icon or press the scan shortcut. Point your scanner at the product barcode — it will automatically add the item to the cart. You can also generate and print barcode labels from the Barcode Labels page.
